# Beare, Brown, & Pimbblet 2014 (arxiv.org/abs/1410.8139)
# 
# Table 4: Parameters for Calculating Absolute Magnitudes
# Mr = a(g - i)**2 + b(g - i) + c - DM + r or 
# Mr = a(r - z)**2 + b(r - z) + c - DM + z
# 
# Z: (r-z)-corr: a b c error   Z: (g-i)-corr: a b c error
